text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ah. Yaho-♪ 
Hey you, we've been meeting a lot lately.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Just now, I was watching a mock race 
at the track down there. Maya can't race myself so-.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Must be nice to race～ I wish Maya could race too. 
But―
choice_data_list: You really don't want to train?
Do you really not want to train?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ……I mean.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: They told me I had to train, so I did train once.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But they only do things that can be understood in one session. If 
you get it, it's boring.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: What is the point of doing boring things all the time?

Mayano Top Gun is able to find the "right answer" to everything 
immediately, and is able to do it.
Maybe she has never achieved anything through hard work.

So, she may not understand what it means to make an effort. 
Which may be why training just seems boring and painful to her……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
……Maya do think that Maya 
should train properly like Yukippe 
and the others, you know?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I know that City-san and Tamamo-san are 
also training every day. I know 
that everyone is doing it…

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But no matter how hard I try, 
it's just too boring. I think to myself, 
'This is pointless'.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I guess I'm not good enough because I'm not like…… everyone else. 
Maybe Maya can't become a sparkling Uma Musume after all……?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Woah! 
You scared me……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I didn't know you could speak so loud. 
You seemed so gentle……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hmmm………

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
……Hey, uhm. 
Do you also want Maya to train too?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hmmm…… I see.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
……Okay? If you listen to Maya, 
I'll listen to you and train!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ummm♪ 
Could you………

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Go on a date with Maya!?
The next day at noon, in front of the station―

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
LANDING!! 
Sorry to keep you waiting ♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe, thanks for coming today! I've always wanted to go on a 
date like the mature Uma Musume do.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
So, where should we go? We can't miss shopping at fancy 
stores and visiting shiny new sweets shops!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Also, we should watch a romantic movie, right? 
I also want to have a cup of tea at a cafe like an adult… 
Man, I'm getting excited～!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
We need to move fast, or the day 
will be over! Let's go, Take――Off!
After that, Mayano Top Gun took me around town at a great pace……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Look at that T-shirt, it's so cute! 
Oh, is that a juice stand!? 
I wonder if they have carrot juice!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hmm? *sniff *sniff…… It smells so good! It's coming from over here! 
Let's go, let's go～!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Come on, don't just stand there! 
Follow Maya closely♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Which one should we watch? Hmmm, they 
all look interesting～…… Oh, Hyaaa!?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Awawawa, the… the preview on the monitor showed a kissing scene…! 
I saw it～!! Uw… my face feels so hot……!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
How much ice cream can I stack? One? Two? Three! 
Let's make it three! It's decided then!!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Which one should I choose～? Strawberry looks delicious…… and 
vanilla～ and chocolate chip cookies and～ ……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Eh? Cheesecake flavor is only available for a limited time!…… 
Hey-hey, let's make it to four～!!
I spent the whole day dragged around by Mayano Top Gun……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ah～ that was fun!!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
You're amazing, by the way! You might be the first person ever other 
than Mabe-chan to follow Maya through all the way to the end!
choice_data_list: I thought I was going to collapse halfway through……
I thought I was going to collapse halfway through……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, is that so! Then you must've worked really hard! Thanks.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
……Hey-uhmm. Why are you being so nice to me? 
Why did you go on a date with Maya?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Is it because, 
Maya promised to train if you did what I asked?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
No? What do you mean? You didn't go on a date with me 
because you wanted me to train?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: If not, why did you come?
choice_data_list: I don't want you to give up on your dreams.
I don't want you to give up on your dreams.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Dreams……?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: My, Dreams……

Mayano Top Gun kept quiet for 
a while, as if she was in deep thought. Then suddenly―

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ……I see.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Umm…… thanks so much for today-!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: We'll train together tomorrow!
Thus, we're going to give Mayano Top Gun some training!
